title: Colors Mask Facer for Moto 360
developerAddress: Office #2, 2nd Floor, 37-A, Civic Centre, Bahria Town, Islamabad
description: Colors mask facer is a modern digital yet a simple watchface for your android wear. It is a blend of digital design with a circulating color dial for second’s presentation. With a contrast of high tone colors and black background this watch face presents an elegant look for your smart watch. It has dynamic Interface with mobile and watch battery update packed in a clean look.FrillRoid Watch Faces focus in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect that ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.Key custom features:-• Watch battery update.• Mobile battery update.• Easy readability with hybrid design.• Multi-colored themes.• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than everThis watch face is for round/circular smart watches only such as the LG Watch Urbane, LG Watch R and Motorola Moto 360. Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.How it works?It’s simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
descriptionHTML:
Colors mask facer is a modern digital yet a simple watchface for your android wear. It is a blend of digital design with a circulating color dial for second’s presentation. With a contrast of high tone colors and black background this watch face presents an elegant look for your smart watch. It has dynamic Interface with mobile and watch battery update packed in a clean look.

FrillRoid Watch Faces focus in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect that ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.
Key custom features:-

• Watch battery update.
• Mobile battery update.
• Easy readability with hybrid design.
• Multi-colored themes.
• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than ever
This watch face is for round/circular smart watches only such as the LG Watch Urbane, LG Watch R and Motorola Moto 360. Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.

How it works?

It’s simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
comments: Did not work! I upgraded and paid for the pro, but thru Android wear it kept asking me to upgrade.  I restarted my LG and still the same error.  Refund!!!
